title: The Best Tech From CES 2020
description: From a cute rolling robot that follows you around, to an alien future car that youll never be able to buy ... the annual Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas had a more exciting cross section of mobile tech than it's had in years. Join MrMobile for a rundown of the best tech from CES 2020!    [SUBSCRIBE TO MRMOBILE]     [ABOUT MRMOBILE'S CES 2020 RUNDOWN]  MrMobile's Best Tech From CES 2020 was produced following a week at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, NV in January 2020. MrMobile does not produce paid or sponsored reviews; no company featured in this video was offered copy approval, and no compensation was requested or provided in exchange for this coverage.   MrMobile's presence at CES 2020 was made possible by Mercedes-Benz, who provided travel to and from Las Vegas. The company was not given copy approval or editorial input concerning any content produced on-site.
